Summary: A circle that was very colorful and bright moving in a triangle pattern
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Boonville
There were no other sightings in Boonville on or around November 6th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my grandparents field looking for deer and I thought that I should head home. As I was walking home i noticed a little ball of colorful light and looked at the object through my binoculars. That was when I saw a circle object that had colors changing going all over it. As i watched it the object moved in a triangle pattern counter clockwise. I also noticed that the object had smaller white circles on the inside edge of the circle object. I walked a little forward toward it and it was gone.
